name: Lance Lazor Tagalong bank
description:
This is a "troll bank" If you want to know the history of it....click the video. This is lacne's outfit. How would you color her if this was a book called Twilight and she really wanted to be a pearly white vampire! :D who drank bears!  She should have a red or pink stripe, red eyes, orange or red hair and dark skin with the spots as freckles! Blue coloring but the bandages if flower should be pink! lance lazor is only ever not public domain for religious reasons. So um.....how do you want to make her sing pretty and the video lance....is

also feel free to distort the design for a horror or other sona!
